settings.title: Cyber Intelligence Hub
settings.description: Interactive cybersecurity blog integrated with Rokkam Vamshi's main portfolio

template.title: Your Blog Title Here
template.description: Brief description of your blog post content and key learning points

week1.title: Week 1
week1.description: Foundational topics: OSI Model, TCP/IP stack, Subnetting, and DNS.

week2.title: Week 2
week2.description: Networking fundamentals: PAN/LAN/VLAN/WLAN/CAN/SAN/MAN/WAN, hubs/switches/routers/modems, Bluetooth/Wi‑Fi security, ARP poisoning, SSL/TLS.

week3.title: Week 3
week3.description: Browsers and the Web: Internet vs WWW, browser evolution and architecture, rendering pipeline (DOM/CSSOM/JS), omnibox.

week4.title: Week 4
week4.description: Browser security: isolated storage per origin, subresource integrity, cookie attributes (SameSite/HttpOnly/Secure), strict MIME type checking, clickjacking defense.

week5.title: Week 5
week5.description: Web fundamentals: HTTP evolution (0.9 to 3.0), TLS/SSL history, content negotiation, caching and headers.

week6.title: Week 6
week6.description: System design basics: proxies, reverse proxies, latency, REST/SOAP APIs, CDNs, WebSockets, webhooks, microservices, message queues, API gateway, rate limiting, idempotency, servers.

week7.title: Week 7
week7.description: Web app architecture: client‑server, monoliths, microservices, serverless, MVC, SOA, SPA fundamentals.

week8.title: Week 8
week8.description: HTTP headers deep dive: request/response classes, auth headers, CORS, representation headers, cookies/state, caching, HSTS, and key security headers.

week9.title: Week 9
week9.description: Front‑end and back‑end overview: static→dynamic web, CGI to application servers, backend languages/frameworks, app servers, front‑end frameworks and meta‑frameworks.

week10.title: Week 10—Learning Basic Concepts of Cybersecurity
week10.description: Front‑end concepts: Vanilla JS, JSX, AJAX, components, and SPA routing basics.
